author: valsdav
body:
Adding DeepSC model trained with the following conditions: 

- EcalPedestal tag for 235/fb noise
- Two different PFRechitThresholds scenario
  - EcalPFRecHitThresholds_UL_2018_2e3sig: UL18 noise scenario, using 2 sigmas until eta=2.5 and then 3 sigmas
  - EcalPFRecHitThresholds_34sigma_TL235: 235/fb noise scenario, using 3 sigmas until eta=2.5 and then 4 sigmas
title: DeepSC models for PFRechitThresholds tests
